plugin.name: animation
plugin.long: Use various animations as window effects

option.name: open_effects
option.long: The animation effect shown when creating a window.

option.name: open_durations
option.long: Animation duration in milliseconds for open effect.

option.name: open_matches
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

default.value: (type=Menu | PopupMenu | DropdownMenu | Combo | Dialog | ModalDialog | Normal)

option.name: open_options
option.long: Comma separated list of option value assignments to override effect settings, e.g.: fire_color=#0080ffff, fire_particles=700, fire_smoke=1

option.name: open_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to use all effects.

option.name: close_effects
option.long: The animation effect shown when closing a window.

option.name: close_durations
option.long: Animation duration in milliseconds for close effect.

option.name: close_matches
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

default.value: (type=Menu | PopupMenu | DropdownMenu | Combo | Dialog | ModalDialog | Normal)

option.name: close_options
option.long: Comma separated list of option value assignments to override effect settings, e.g.: fire_color=#0080ffff, fire_particles=700, fire_smoke=1

option.name: close_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to use all effects.

option.name: minimize_effects
option.long: The animation effect shown when minimizing a window.

option.name: minimize_durations
option.long: Animation duration in milliseconds for minimize effect.

option.name: minimize_matches
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

option.name: minimize_options
option.long: Comma separated list of option value assignments to override effect settings, e.g.: fire_color=#0080ffff, fire_particles=700, fire_smoke=1

option.name: minimize_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to use all effects.

option.name: shade_effects
option.long: The animation effect shown when shading a window.

option.name: shade_durations
option.long: Animation duration in milliseconds for shade effect.

option.name: shade_matches
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when shaded.

option.name: shade_options
option.long: Comma separated list of option value assignments to override effect settings, e.g.: fire_color=#0080ffff, fire_particles=700, fire_smoke=1

option.name: shade_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to use all effects.

option.name: focus_effects
option.long: The animation effect shown when focusing a window.

option.name: focus_durations
option.long: Animation duration in milliseconds for focus effect.

option.name: focus_matches
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when focused.

option.name: focus_options
option.long: Comma separated list of option value assignments to override effect settings, e.g.: fire_color=#0080ffff, fire_particles=700, fire_smoke=1

option.name: all_random
option.long: All effects are chosen randomly, ignoring the selected effect. If None is selected for an event, that event won't be animated.

option.name: time_step
option.long: The amount of time in milliseconds between each render of the animation. The higher the number, the jerkier the movements become.

option.name: curved_fold_amp_mult
option.long: Fold amplitude (size) is multiplied by this number. Negative values fold outward.

option.name: curved_fold_zoom_to_taskbar
option.long: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Curved Fold effect.

option.name: dodge_mode
option.long: Fixed Clicked Window: The window that is clicked on will stay fixed. All Moving: The clicked window will do a dodging action as well.

option.name: dodge_gap_ratio
option.long: Ratio of gaps between dodge start times to focus duration.

option.name: dream_zoom_to_taskbar
option.long: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Dream effect.

option.name: glide1_away_position
option.long: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera).

option.name: glide1_away_angle
option.long: Angle of window at the end of the animation.

option.name: glide1_zoom_to_taskbar
option.long: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Glide 1 effect.

option.name: glide2_away_position
option.long: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera).

option.name: glide2_away_angle
option.long: Angle of window at the end of the animation.

option.name: glide2_zoom_to_taskbar
option.long: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Glide 2 effect.

option.name: horizontal_folds_amp_mult
option.long: Fold amplitude (size) is multiplied by this number. Negative values fold outward.

option.name: horizontal_folds_num_folds
option.long: The number of horizontal folds that occur in the Horizontal Fold animation.

option.name: horizontal_folds_zoom_to_taskbar
option.long: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Horizontal Folds effect.

option.name: magic_lamp_moving_end
option.long: On open/close, move magic lamp ending point with the mouse pointer.

option.name: magic_lamp_grid_res
option.long: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases).

option.name: magic_lamp_open_start_width
option.long: Starting width of open effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp.

option.name: magic_lamp_wavy_moving_end
option.long: On open/close, move magic lamp ending point with the mouse pointer.

option.name: magic_lamp_wavy_grid_res
option.long: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp Wavy (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases).

option.name: magic_lamp_wavy_max_waves
option.long: The maximum number of waves for Magic Lamp Wavy.

option.name: magic_lamp_wavy_amp_min
option.long: The minimum wave amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp Wavy will have.

option.name: magic_lamp_wavy_amp_max
option.long: The maximum wave amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp Wavy will have.

option.name: magic_lamp_wavy_open_start_width
option.long: Starting width of open effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp Wavy.

option.name: rollup_fixed_interior
option.long: Fixed window interior during the Rollup animation.

option.name: sidekick_num_rotations
option.long: Number of rotations for Sidekick (plus or minus 10% for randomness).

option.name: sidekick_springiness
option.long: How spring-like the Sidekick animation should be.

option.name: sidekick_zoom_from_center
option.long: Zoom from center when playing the Sidekick animation.

option.name: wave_width
option.long: The width of the wave relative to the window height.

option.name: wave_amp_mult
option.long: Wave amplitude (size) is multiplied by this number. Negative values fold outward.

option.name: zoom_from_center
option.long: Zoom from center when playing the Zoom animation.

option.name: zoom_springiness
option.long: How spring-like the Zoom animation should be.
